sentences.en: By siddhis, or mystic perfections , one can take shortcuts across space.
sentences.cn: 让我们想一想平行世界的概念.

sentences.en: He is interested in mystic rites and ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 他对神秘的仪式感兴趣.

sentences.en: His mystic conduct is hard to understand.
sentences.cn: 他的神秘行为令人难以理解.

sentences.en: Leading a life of calm duty , constant routine, mystic reverie, -- made them a sort of nuns.
sentences.cn: 那种安份守己的平静生活, 千篇一律的日常事物, 虚无 缥缈 的沉思冥想, 使她们成了隐修院外的修女.

sentences.en: Mystic and attractive Gemini has to do with our communications.
sentences.cn: 神秘而有魅力的双子座影响着大家的社交.

sentences.en: Mystic lakes and sparkling waterfalls captivate your eyes as you enter the ravine.
sentences.cn: 当你步入沟中,便可见瀑布舒洒碧玉.

sentences.en: Mystic or religious poetry is sometimes of vastly different styles.
sentences.cn: 神秘主义的或宗教的诗歌有时风格多样.

sentences.en: Mystic River is a dark masterpiece about deep characterization, love, and betrayal.
sentences.cn: 神秘河流所展现出巧妙的特性描述 、 爱和背叛,绝对是一本不容错过的黑暗小说的杰作.

sentences.en: One French magazine has labeled his art " erotic - mystic - animist. "
sentences.cn: 法国一本杂志称其为 “ 好色且神秘的万物有灵论者 ”.

sentences.en: People are looking for the mystic things for their life times.
sentences.cn: 人们一生中总是在寻找神秘的东西.

sentences.en: The ballet dancer is not that mystic creature anymore.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞蹈演员再也不是那种神秘的生物了.

sentences.en: The company of all Christians regarded as a mystic spiritual body.
sentences.cn: 基督教徒组织,神秘的精神团体.

sentences.en: The mystic chords which bind and thrill the heart of the nation, they will never know.
sentences.cn: 那种联结世人的心灵、激发他们情感的神秘心弦, 是他们永远无法理解的.

sentences.en: The mystic token alighted on the hither verge of the stream.
sentences.cn: 那神秘的标志落在离小溪不远的地方.

words.tran_cn: 神秘的；不可思议的；难解的
神秘地；故弄玄虚地；难以理解地
神秘，秘密；奥秘；神秘的事物
神秘化；困惑不解；骗人的把戏
使神秘化；使迷惑，使困惑
